author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
> [noblock]
> 
> Looks like there is a merge conflict.
> 
> @evanderveer Can you re-trigger Registrator? This will fix the merge conflict.

A different version of the package has already been merged. This one can be closed.

body:
- Registering package: DifferentialPhaseContrast.jl
- Repository: https://github.com/evanderveer/DifferentialPhaseContrast.jl
- Created by: @evanderveer
- Version: v1.0.0
- Commit: 2042c758516b5f55020a35dc04bec187df309486
- Reviewed by: @evanderveer
- Reference: https://github.com/evanderveer/DifferentialPhaseContrast.jl/issues/2#issuecomment-1912526903
- Description: DifferentialPhaseContrast.jl provides functions for calculating integrated and differentiated differential phase contrast scanning transmission electron microscopy (DPC-STEM) images from data from a four-segment annular dark field detector.
<!--  -->
title: New package: DifferentialPhaseContrast.jl v1.0.0
